original_text: The Lord hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.
korean_text: 여호와께서 다윗에게 성실히 맹세하셨으니 변하지 아니하실지라 이르시기를 네 몸의 소생을 네 왕위에 둘지라

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath sworn in truth unto David
he will not turn from it
Of the fruit of thy body
will I set upon thy throne
